title: In the Chef’s Corner: Hand Blender | KitchenAid
description: Chef Josh Moore of Volare Italian Ristorante in Louisville, Kentucky uses the KitchenAid hand blender to make seared scallops topped with crispy prosciutto, served over sweet pea puree. For more information about KitchenAid hand blenders

asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText: Chef Josh Moore of Volare Italian Ristorante in Louisville, Kentucky uses the KitchenAid hand blender to make seared scallops topped with crispy prosciutto, served over sweet pea puree. For more information about KitchenAid hand blenders, please visit: http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/hand-blenders/.
